meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6535.

td.p: Olivia Hummer, a senior from Covina, California
William Crouch, a sophomore from Warner Robins, Georgia
Arjun Byju, a senior from Sarasota, Florida

tr.td: WORDS CONTAINING SILENT LETTERS
MYTHOLOGY
IT'S ELEMENTAL!
DISNEY MOVIES BY VILLAIN
NOT TO BE CONFUSED
HOMECOMING

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: They didn\'t have telescopes, so they didn\'t know about all the planets.)
...
[revealing William\'s response]
Nope, not visible to the naked eye at that time.)
...
[revealing Olivia\'s response]
If you had gone one planet more to [*], you\'d\'ve had the correct response.)
ArjunWhat is Neptune?
$2,600
WilliamWhat is Neptune?
$2,800
OliviaWhat is [Mars crossed off] Jupitor?
$6,600
Saturn')

William
Olivia
